body: Nwachukwu Egbunike discusses endless chatter in Nigeria's political space: "Nobody can belittle the political sway of Atiku Abubakar, former Vice President of Nigeria. Nonetheless, no Nigerian politician is yet to surpass his endless pilgrimage to the courts to adjudicate on power issues."
original_body: Nwachukwu Egbunike discusses endless chatter in Nigeria's political space: "Nobody can belittle the political sway of Atiku Abubakar, former Vice President of Nigeria. Nonetheless, no Nigerian politician is yet to surpass his endless pilgrimage to the courts to adjudicate on power issues."
title: Nigeria: Endless Chatter in Nigeria's Political Space
